attributes.action: Require psychics and mediums to be certified as suitable to provide services to a high standard
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Psychics trade with no regulatory body to oversee their work. Last year my Mother commited suicide after visiting a medium who gave her advice which I believe had a direct affect on the situation.

These people should be governed by a body which is able to investigate claims of malpractice and remove their certification if they are found to be putting their customers at risk.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
